spaska.classifiers

Class DecisionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaska.classifiers.DecisionTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClassifier, Parametrable

    public final class DecisionTree
extends Object
implements IClassifier
    A dicision tree algorithm based on ID3 and C4.5. Attributes are considered for splitting according to their gain ratio. The higher the gain ratio, the bigger the chance the attribute will be chosen for splitting. Numeric attributes define binary split points of the form (<= value ; > value). Instances with unknown attributes are copied and then spread among all possible values of the splitting attribute. These instances are given weight according to the popularity of the attribute value, however, at this stage this weight is not considered. New instances which encounter a test, such that their value for that attribute is unknown, are classified as the most popular class for that branch.
